He's tyrannical, he's ______, he's undisciplined, he's over-sexed.
result.chn: 残暴，贪婪，毫无修养，沉溺美色。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: The beauty of the world, the ______ of animals and yet, to me, what is this quintessence of dust?
result.chn: 宇宙之华，万物之灵,但对于我，这尘土的精华又算得了什么？(公正课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: (To ______ this disturbing trend,) government agencies and private companies are using public service announcements and safety events to raise awareness.

It has been tempered in a celestial fire in ether, and it was the ether of the ______ heavens that had always been thought -throughout the Renaissance and long before, of course -- to be the most perfect substance imaginable.
result.chn: 它是在广阔苍穹的天国之火中被锻造出，也是飘渺的天堂中的以太,不断地被提及,-贯穿于文艺复兴的始终，当然--是可想见的最完美的物质。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: I think that his ______ way of bringing things down to earth when they get a little too highfalutin' involves the skill of a genuine stand-up comic.
result.chn: 我认为他是真的有漫画人物的效果,当他总是面无表情的’,让那些过分骄傲的人回归现实。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: He says food aid from the earthquake relief effort produced a ______ that pushed down prices.
But going beyond this trusted ______'s solid presence in delivering such news, you have to know something about television news in that era.
God created a good world, But humans in the exercise of their moral ______, They have the power to corrupt the good.
result.chn: 上帝创作了一个美好的世界，但人类掌控自己的道德，他们有能力腐蚀美好事物。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Critics also say the European Union did not properly ______ the figures sent in by Athens.
Foreign aid paid for the pump that brings up the water and fills this ______.
Anti-child-bride activists looked ______ when the judge pronounced the couple divorced.
